name: Chef Li
bio: Chef Li is a master of Sichuan cuisine, known for his bold flavors and use of Sichuan peppercorns. He has been cooking for over 15 years and has won numerous awards for his culinary skills.

recipe.name: Kung Pao Chicken
recipe.cooking_method: 1. Marinate chicken in soy sauce, vinegar, and cornstarch. 2. Fry chicken until crispy. 3. Stir fry garlic, ginger, and dried red chilies. 4. Add peanuts and scallions. 5. Add chicken and sugar. 6. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Hot and Sour Soup
recipe.cooking_method: 1. Soak dried mushrooms and black fungus in hot water. 2. Stir fry pork, mushrooms, and fungus. 3. Add chicken broth and bring to a boil. 4. Add tofu, bamboo shoots, and white pepper. 5. Thicken with cornstarch and beaten eggs. 6. Add vinegar and soy sauce. 7. Serve hot.

recipe.name: Steamed Dumplings
recipe.cooking_method: 1. Mix ground pork, chopped cabbage, ginger, onions, soy sauce, sesame oil, and rice wine. 2. Place filling on dumpling wrapper and seal. 3. Steam dumplings for 8-10 minutes. 4. Serve hot with dipping sauce.

name: Chef Zhang
bio: Chef Zhang specializes in Cantonese cuisine, and is especially skilled in cooking seafood. He has been cooking for over 10 years and has worked at some of the top restaurants in Shanghai.

name: Chef Chen
bio: Chef Chen is a master of Fujian cuisine, and is known for his skill in creating delicate and flavorful dishes. He has been cooking for over 8 years and has won several awards for his culinary creations.

name: Chef Wang
bio: Chef Wang is an expert in Hunan cuisine, and is known for his use of spicy and sour flavors. He has been cooking for over 12 years and has worked at some of the top restaurants in Beijing.

name: Chef Liu
bio: Chef Liu is a master of Jiangsu cuisine, and is known for his skill in creating dishes that balance sweet and savory flavors. He has been cooking for over 7 years and has won several awards for his culinary creations.

name: Chef Yang
bio: Chef Yang specializes in Shandong cuisine, and is known for his skill in creating hearty and flavorful dishes. He has been cooking for over 5 years and has worked at some of the top restaurants in Guangzhou.
